text: @SecPompeo Sir, you should be deeply concerned that you cannot bring yourself to say honestly that Coronavirus is no hoax, but rather a serious & real infectious concern that requires us to get the input of our best scientists, like Dr Fauci.  Authoritarian responses are not acceptable.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
